metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Total Eclipse of the Heart has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Total Eclipse of the Heart has sections analyzed in the following keys: A♭ Major, C♯ Mixolydian,  and E Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
